name: Voidspawn Vambraces
data: It increases the users intelligence superbly.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'mastery of psychokinetics'.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'cryokinesis'.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'choke'.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
The vambraces help their wearer conjure the cold vacuum of the void.
They also draw light from their surroundings.
